Post-Match Reflections: 'We're trying to put all that stuff past us and really worry about the guys in the locker room, the guys that go out on the court every single night…You try to put this one past you…'
'No, I don't think we make any excuses for this…we have to get to work…just want the guys to rest up and get our collective minds ready for a great opportunity on this road trip…'
Miscellaneous Highlights: Miami also was out-rebounded by a large margin, 57-32, as that's the sixth time in team history that another team had at least 25 boards more.
